results.name: Fourth powers of Lucas numbers A000032.
reference: Mohammad K. Azarian, Identities Involving Lucas or Fibonacci and Lucas Numbers as Binomial Sums, International Journal of Contemporary Mathematical Sciences, Vol. 7, No. 45, 2012, pp. 2221-2227.
A. T. Benjamin and J. J. Quinn, Proofs that really count: the art of combinatorial proof, M.A.A. 2003, id. 56.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,15,-15,-5,1).
program: (PARI) for(n=0, 30, print1( (fibonacci(n+1) + fibonacci(n-1))^4, ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 21 2017
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Nov 01 2004
